channels.description:
Welcome to the Calvary Assembly of God Church in Negombo, Sri Lanka! 
Join us every Sunday for a spiritually enriching experience as we bring you live sermons in both Tamil and Sinhala.

Live Streaming Schedule:
üïó First Sunday of each month - Combined (Sinhala & Tamil) Sermon at 8 AM

Join us every Sunday for a powerful, soul-nourishing experience at Calvary Assembly of God Church in Negombo, Sri Lanka.

channels.title: Boss Wallah (Tamil)
channels.description:
Boss Wallah is a platform for small business owners and aspiring business owners. We enable you to learn the skills to start, operate, and grow your business and live a good life. We provide the structure, support, and a thriving community to help you become the boss you aspire to be.
We have created courses so that you can learn directly from successful entrepreneurs in your chosen field, whether it be retail, farming, food business, or any one of 100+ business areas.
Sometimes video content is not enough and you need to talk directly to an expert. We provide access to 2000+ experts in every imaginable topic so that you can get their advice to solve your business problems.
We provide you all this in the language you are comfortable in. Currently we operate in Telugu, Tamil, Kannada, Hindi, Malayalam, and English.
The Boss Wallah platform is here to support you on your journey. However, success can come only with your hard work and commitment. Go after your dreams. Be the boss!

Our mission is to preserve and promote the rich heritage of Ayurveda, Siddha, Yunani, and Hela medicine. We blend ancient traditions with the highest standards of modern healthcare, offering holistic treatments that honor Sri Lanka‚Äôs time-tested practices.

At Ceylon Hospital, we specialize in traditional therapies like Sarvanga Abhyanga, Pattu, Swedana Karma, Nasya Karma, and Vasthi Karma. These treatments harness the healing power of natural remedies and preventive care, focusing on whole-body wellness. With a team of over 1,000 experienced Ayurveda, Siddha, Yunani, and Hela practitioners, we are dedicated to delivering safe, personalized care.

Whether you seek relief from chronic conditions or wish to maintain overall well-being, Ceylon Hospital is your sanctuary for rejuvenation, where ancient wisdom meets modern healthcare.

channels.title: Black Ant Dambulla
channels.description:
The Traverse into Stories; Not Just Landscape : Black Ant Dambulla Experience invites you to explore the rich cultural and natural heritage of Sri Lanka through an unforgettable journey in the Dambulla region. This immersive program is designed to connect participants with the island's vibrant history and stunning landscapes, offering a unique blend of cultural exploration and eco-adventure.

Begin your journey at the Dambulla Temple and Caves, a UNESCO World Heritage site, where ancient frescoes and rock formations tell the stories of Sri Lanka‚Äôs spiritual past. Next, explore the Megalithic Cemetery, delving into the fascinating prehistoric burial practices that shaped early Sri Lankan culture.Participants will have the opportunity to engage with local communities at Kandalama Tank, enjoying an Authentic Village Lunch featuring traditional cuisine. The adventure continues with kayaking at Kalawewa, complemented by a magical camping night under the stars, ...........

People from South India also go there to worship. The town has the Kataragama temple, a shrine dedicated to Skanda Kumara also known as Kataragama deviyo. Kataragama is located in the Monaragala District of Uva province, Sri Lanka. It is 228 km ESE of Colombo, the capital of Sri Lanka. Although Kataragama was a small village in medieval times, today it is a fast-developing township surrounded by jungle in the southeastern region of Sri Lanka.

channels.title: Sri lanka Elephants
channels.description:
Sri Lanka's Majestic Elephants

Sri Lanka is home to a significant population of Asian elephants, playing a vital role in its biodiversity and culture. These gentle giants feature in religious festivals like Kandy Esala Perahera and were historically used in royal processions.

Wildlife and Conservation

National parks such as Udawalawe, Minneriya, and Yala offer excellent opportunities to see elephants in the wild. Minneriya is famous for "The Gathering", where hundreds of elephants assemble during the dry season.

Conservation Efforts

Expanding human settlements causes habitat loss, leading to conflicts. Conservation programs and sanctuaries, like the Elephant Transit Home in Udawalawe, work to protect these animals.

Ethical Tourism

Visitors should support ethical sanctuaries that ensure elephant welfare. These majestic creatures remain a national treasure, symbolizing strength and wisdom, and must be preserved for future generations.

channels.title: Dr. Nadina Galle
channels.description:
Nature and technology: friends or enemies? Dr. Nadina Galle is an ecological engineer, technologist, and keynote & TEDx speaker fascinated by this question. 

Nadina coined the term the ‚ÄúInternet of Nature" in her award-winning Ph.D. research to bridge the gap between green cities and smart cities in an era of rampant urban development. 

Nadina is also the host of the Internet of Nature Podcast, a weekly deep-dive where she interviews entrepreneurs & innovators on their technologies for building greener and smarter cities. You can watch episodes of the Internet of Nature Podcast, as well as interviews, talks, and Q&As from Nadina on this YouTube channel. 

For other ways to engage with Nadina's world:

Visit https://nadinagalle.com where you can sign up for Nadina's email newsletter.

channels.description:
About Us
Dhammika & Priscilla Foundation is a not-for-profit organization focused on providing free quality education & healthcare facilities for all. DP Education is the digital learning platform that delivers the Foundation's vision of equal access to world-class free digital learning & healthcare to accelerate human capability development. DP Education - Science delivers science lessons of the school curriculum along with Past Paper, Revision & Model Paper discussions and Live Classes. 

Vision
We provide equal access to world-class digital learning, and healthcare facilities to develop  human capability to eliminate poverty.

Mission
Dedicated to transform learning and teaching experiences through free online education, best-in-class teachers, and the development of education infrastructure.

Leadership 
Dhammika Perera & Priscilla Perera are the Co-Founders of the Foundation. The overall direction of all initiatives are set by the Chairman of the Foundation, Dhammika Perera.

channels.title: Vegetarian Sri Lankan Kitchen
channels.description:
My name is Aarany and I live in a small village in Sri Lanka. I love cooking traditional Sri Lankan and Indian food for my family. I use local ingredients and prefer to cook vegetarian or vegan. I buy all ingredients from local markets or harvest the ingredients myself. 

For me cooking is a part of my culture and traditions. In the modern world, traditional recipes and cooking methods are quickly forgotten. With this channel I want to share the original taste and traditional way of cooking with other people. I want to inspire people and show them that cooking is something beautiful.  

For me, food means spending time with my family and that is the most important thing in the world. You can't buy this happiness with any money in the world. I love my traditional life. Because that's what makes me happy. I want to inspire you with my videos to appreciate and enjoy the little things in life.

Our videos cover a wide range of topics, from project planning and scheduling to risk management, stakeholder management, and team communication. We'll also dive into specific project management methodologies like Agile, Waterfall, and hybrid and when to use each.

Whether you're a seasoned project manager or just starting out, our channel is designed to help you improve your skills and take your projects to the next level. We'll share real-world examples, case studies, and best practices that you can apply to your own projects.

So, if you're ready to become a master of project management, hit the subscribe button and join our community today!

channels.title: BERTRAM NIHAL
channels.description:
Bertram Nihal is a communicator, visualizer and pioneer media artist in Sri Lanka.  His professional work in the audio-visual media spans over 38 years.  He has produced over one thousand Television programmes on a vast variety of subject-areas. He is a Screenwriter, Director and Producer and over and above that, an Author of a series of books on audio-visual art                   forms.  He has won both National and International Awards for his Audio Visual  Media works. He began his professional career in the field of media as an Information Officer in the Government Information Department, before undergoing one year training in the Government Film Unit, Sri Lanka Broadcasting Corporation and the Government Press  in Sri Lanka. He has been a pioneer television producer of Sri Lanka Rupavahini Corporation (State TV) having joined it at its inception in 1982.

channels.title: UDAWALAWE  OFFICIAL
channels.description: Udawalawe is a popular national park located in Sri Lanka, known for its diverse wildlife and picturesque landscapes. Covering an area of approximately 30,821 hectares, the park is home to a large population of elephants, making it a prime destination for elephant enthusiasts and wildlife lovers. The park's terrain consists of open grasslands, marshes, and forests, providing a variety of habitats for different species. Visitors can embark on thrilling safari tours to observe elephants, crocodiles, leopards, and various bird species in their natural habitats. The park also plays a vital role in elephant conservation and research, offering a unique opportunity to learn about these majestic creatures.

Lakshitha Mihiran, known as Mihiran, is a Sri Lankan musician, rapper, composer, and songwriter making waves in pop, hip-hop, trap, and lofi music. His unique style and talent have earned him a strong presence in the industry.

Mihiran first rose to fame on Voice of Teen Sri Lanka, where his heartfelt performances won over fans and launched his career.

His hits, including "Mulawe," "Maga Haree," and "Ma Deparak," have been massive successes. His songs regularly top charts on platforms like YouTube, Spotify, and Apple Music, cementing his status as a leading artist.

Beyond his hits, Mihiran has composed melodies for several popular tracks, further shaping the Sri Lankan music scene.

channels.title: Rhythm of Clarance
channels.description:
Arthur Somasinghe Wijewardena (3 August 1943 ‚Äì 13 December 1996) commonly known as Clarence Wijewardena (‡∂ö‡∑ä‡∂Ω‡∑ê‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∑É‡∑ä ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂¢‡∑ö‡∑Ä‡∂ª‡∑ä‡∂∞‡∂±) was one of the most respected musicians in Sri Lanka, as per his popularity and contribution to revolutionise Sri Lankan Sinhala Pop Music who pioneered the use of the electric guitar in Sinhala music, in the 1960s and is often named as the father of Sri Lankan pop music ‚Äì having influenced performers ranging from W. D. Amaradeva, Premasiri Khemadasa to Athula Adhikari. His music is often characterised by simple melodies built around a melody that features the electric guitar

 Many of his songs are considered classics, and continue to enjoy ample airtime on Sri Lankan television and radio broadcasts and on some overseas radio stations. The songs such as Rasa Pirunu Katha, Geeyakin Kese, Eatha Ran Wiman Yowun Sihina Loke, etc. are very popular among present generation which again demonstrated his talent in composing music (also as a lyricist) for the future.
